description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军高级将领，中国人民解放军军事家之一。
description.en: A senior commander of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, recognized as one of the PLA's militarists.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，与黄公略在湘军时期结为挚友，共同发动平江起义。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, became a close friend of Huang Gonglue during their time in the Hunan Army, and co-led the Pingjiang Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军将领，与黄公略、彭德怀在湘军时期结为挚友。
description.en: A commander of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, who became a close friend of Huang Gonglue and Peng Dehuai during their time in the Hunan Army.

description.zh-cn: 清末民初时期湖南的的一支地方军队。黄公略于1916年加入。
description.en: A regional army from Hunan during the late Qing dynasty and early Republican era. Huang Gonglue joined in 1916.

description.zh-cn: 位于湖南的军事学校，黄公略曾于此学习。
description.en: A military academy in Hunan where Huang Gonglue studied.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期的著名军事学校，黄公略曾在此高级班学习。
description.en: A famous military academy during the Republic of China era, where Huang Gonglue studied in the advanced class.

description.zh-cn: 中国的执政党，黄公略于1927年加入。
description.en: The ruling political party of China, which Huang Gonglue joined in 1927.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国民政府属下的国家军队。黄公略曾于北伐战争期间在此服役，后在第三次反围剿战争中遭其空袭身亡。
description.en: The national army of the Nationalist Government of the Republic of China. Huang Gonglue served in it during the Northern Expedition and was later killed by its air raid during the Third Encirclement Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 1926年至1928年间由国民革命军发动旨在统一中国的战争，黄公略曾参与其中。
description.en: A military campaign launched by the National Revolutionary Army from 1926 to 1928 to unify China, in which Huang Gonglue participated.

description.zh-cn: 1928年由彭德怀、黄公略等人领导的军事起义，起义后建立了红五军。
description.en: A military uprising led by Peng Dehuai, Huang Gonglue and others in 1928, which led to the formation of the Red 5th Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军的一支部队，由平江起义部队改编而成，黄公略曾任副军长。
description.en: A unit of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, formed from the troops of the Pingjiang Uprising. Huang Gonglue served as its deputy commander.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军的一支部队，黄公略于1930年调任该军军长。
description.en: A unit of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, to which Huang Gonglue was appointed commander in 1930.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军的一支部队，前身为红六军，黄公略于1930年6月起任该军军长。
description.en: A unit of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, formerly the Red 6th Army. Huang Gonglue served as its commander from June 1930.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在第一次国共内战时期建立的革命根据地之一，黄公略参与了其建立过程。
description.en: One of the revolutionary base areas established by the Communist Party of China during the First Chinese Civil War, in whose establishment Huang Gonglue participated.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在第一次国共内战时期建立的核心革命根据地。黄公略为建立该根据地打下了基础。
description.en: The core revolutionary base area established by the Communist Party of China during the First Chinese Civil War. Huang Gonglue laid the foundation for its establishment.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党与中国共产党之间于1927年至1937年间爆发的内战。黄公略是中共方面的高级将领。
description.en: A civil war fought between the Kuomintang and the Communist Party of China from 1927 to 1937. Huang Gonglue was a senior commander on the CCP side.

nodes.id: 中央苏区第一次反围剿战争

zh-cn: 中央苏区第一次反围剿战争

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军对中央苏区的第一次大规模军事围剿，黄公略率红三军参战。
description.en: The first large-scale military encirclement campaign by the National Revolutionary Army against the Central Soviet Area, in which Huang Gonglue led the Red 3rd Army.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第二次反围剿战争

zh-cn: 中国共产党第二次反围剿战争

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军对中央苏区的第二次大规模军事围剿，黄公略率部参战。
description.en: The second large-scale military encirclement campaign by the National Revolutionary Army against the Central Soviet Area, in which Huang Gonglue led his troops.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第三次反围剿战争

zh-cn: 中国共产党第三次反围剿战争

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军对中央苏区的第三次大规模军事围剿，黄公略在此次战役中阵亡。
description.en: The third large-scale military encirclement campaign by the National Revolutionary Army against the Central Soviet Area, during which Huang Gonglue was killed in action.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治及军事领袖，曾派遣黄公略之兄黄梅庄前去劝降。
description.en: A political and military leader of the Republic of China, who once sent Huang Gonglue's brother, Huang Meizhuang, to persuade him to surrender.

description.zh-cn: 黄公略同父异母的哥哥，受蒋介石派遣劝降黄公略，后被彭德怀处死。
description.en: Huang Gonglue's half-brother, who was sent by Chiang Kai-shek to persuade Huang Gonglue to surrender and was later executed by Peng Dehuai.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的主要缔造者。曾在诗词中盛赞黄公略，并在其牺牲后为其亲写挽联。
description.en: The main founder of the People's Republic of China. He praised Huang Gonglue in his poetry and wrote a memorial couplet for him after his death.

description.zh-cn: 为纪念黄公略而命名的步兵学校。
description.en: An infantry school named in memory of Huang Gonglue.

description.zh-cn: 中华苏维埃共和国设立的以黄公略名字命名的县。
description.en: A county established by the Chinese Soviet Republic and named after Huang Gonglue.

description.zh-cn: 黄公略的妻子。
description.en: Wife of Huang Gonglue.

description.zh-cn: 黄公略与刘玉英的女儿。
description.en: Daughter of Huang Gonglue and Liu Yuying.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军军事家

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军军事家

description.zh-cn: 由中共中央军委认定的36位对中国人民解放军创建与发展作出卓越贡献的高级将领。
description.en: A title for 36 senior commanders recognized by the Central Military Commission of the CCP for their outstanding contributions to the founding and development of the People's Liberation Army.

nodes.id: 100位为新中国成立作出突出贡献的英雄模范人物

zh-cn: 100位为新中国成立作出突出贡献的英雄模范人物

description.zh-cn: 2009年为庆祝中华人民共和国成立60周年，由中国官方评选出的英雄模范人物名单。
description.en: A list of heroic and exemplary figures selected by Chinese officials in 2009 to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the founding of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 湖南省的一个县，是黄公略的出生地。
description.en: A county in Hunan Province, the birthplace of Huang Gonglue.

description.zh-cn: 黄公略出生于湖南省湘乡县桂花乡高木冲。
description.en: Huang Gonglue was born in Gaomuchong, Guihua Township, Xiangxiang County, Hunan Province.

position.en: Clerk, Chinese language instructor, Platoon leader

description.zh-cn: 黄公略于1916年参加湘军，历任文书、国文教员、排长等职。
description.en: Huang Gonglue joined the Hunan Army in 1916 and successively served as a clerk, Chinese language instructor, and platoon leader.

description.zh-cn: 黄公略在湘军服役期间，与同连的彭德怀结为挚友。
description.en: During his service in the Hunan Army, Huang Gonglue became a close friend of Peng Dehuai, who was in the same company.

description.zh-cn: 黄公略在湘军服役期间，与同连的李灿结为挚友。
description.en: During his service in the Hunan Army, Huang Gonglue became a close friend of Li Can, who was in the same company.

description.zh-cn: 黄公略于1922年考入湖南陆军讲武堂，次年结业。
description.en: Huang Gonglue was admitted to the Hunan Military Academy in 1922 and graduated the following year.

description.zh-cn: 1926年7月，黄公略所在的湘军部队改编为国民革命军第八军，他随之加入国民革命军并参加北伐战争。
description.en: In July 1926, the Hunan Army unit Huang Gonglue served in was reorganized into the Eighth Army of the National Revolutionary Army, and he subsequently joined the NRA and participated in the Northern Expedition.

description.zh-cn: 1927年1月，黄公略进入黄埔军校高级班学习。
description.en: In January 1927, Huang Gonglue entered the advanced class of the Whampoa Military Academy to study.

description.zh-cn: 黄公略在黄埔军校学习期间加入了中国共产党。
description.en: Huang Gonglue joined the Communist Party of China while studying at the Whampoa Military Academy.

description.zh-cn: 黄公略率领其部队参与发动平江起义。
description.en: Huang Gonglue led his troops to participate in launching the Pingjiang Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 彭德怀是平江起义的主要领导人之一。
description.en: Peng Dehuai was one of the main leaders of the Pingjiang Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 平江起义后，起义部队组建为中国工农红军第五军。
description.en: After the Pingjiang Uprising, the insurgent troops were organized into the Fifth Army of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

position.en: Deputy Army Commander, Column Commander, Party Representative

description.zh-cn: 红五军成立后，黄公略历任党代表、纵队长、副军长等职。
description.en: After the establishment of the Red 5th Army, Huang Gonglue successively served as Party Representative, Column Commander, and Deputy Army Commander.

description.zh-cn: 1930年1月，黄公略调任红六军军长。
description.en: In January 1930, Huang Gonglue was transferred to be the commander of the Red 6th Army.

description.zh-cn: 1930年6月，黄公略任红三军军长。
description.en: In June 1930, Huang Gonglue was appointed commander of the Red 3rd Army.

description.zh-cn: 黄公略率部在湘鄂赣边区开展游击战争，开辟并建立了湘鄂赣苏区。
description.en: Huang Gonglue led his troops in guerrilla warfare in the Hunan-Hubei-Jiangxi border region, opening up and establishing the Hunan-Hubei-Jiangxi Soviet Area.

description.zh-cn: 黄公略率领红六军在江西西南部开辟根据地，为中央苏区的建立打下了基础。
description.en: Huang Gonglue led the Red 6th Army to open up a base area in southwestern Jiangxi, laying the foundation for the establishment of the Central Soviet Area.

relationships.target: 中央苏区第一次反围剿战争

description.zh-cn: 黄公略率领红三军参加了中央苏区第一次反围剿战争，并在龙冈战斗中担任主力。
description.en: Huang Gonglue led the Red 3rd Army in the First Encirclement Campaign against the Central Soviet Area and served as the main force in the Battle of Longgang.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第三次反围剿战争

description.zh-cn: 黄公略率部参加第三次反围剿战争，期间在一次空袭中牺牲。
description.en: Huang Gonglue led his troops in the Third Encirclement Campaign, during which he was killed in an air raid.

description.zh-cn: 1931年9月15日，在第三次反围剿战争期间，黄公略因国民革命军的空袭而重伤不治身亡。
description.en: On September 15, 1931, during the Third Encirclement Campaign, Huang Gonglue was mortally wounded in an air raid by the National Revolutionary Army and died.

description.zh-cn: 根据黄公略的意见，彭德怀下令处死了前来劝降的黄梅庄。
description.en: Following Huang Gonglue's opinion, Peng Dehuai ordered the execution of Huang Meizhuang, who had come to persuade them to surrender.

description.zh-cn: 黄梅庄是黄公略同父异母的哥哥。
description.en: Huang Meizhuang was Huang Gonglue's half-brother.

description.zh-cn: 刘玉英是黄公略的妻子。
description.en: Liu Yuying was the wife of Huang Gonglue.

description.zh-cn: 黄岁新是黄公略的女儿。
description.en: Huang Suixin is the daughter of Huang Gonglue.

description.zh-cn: 黄岁新是刘玉英的女儿。
description.en: Huang Suixin is the daughter of Liu Yuying.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东在其词《蝶恋花·从汀州到长沙》中写道“偏师借重黄公略”，并为其亲写挽联，高度评价其功绩，提升了其历史地位。
description.en: In his poem "To the tune of Dielianhua: From Tingzhou to Changsha," Mao Zedong wrote "The detached force relies heavily on Huang Gonglue" and personally wrote a memorial couplet for him, highly praising his achievements and elevating his historical status.

description.zh-cn: 为纪念黄公略，中国共产党将新组建的第二步兵学校命名为公略步兵学校。
description.en: To commemorate Huang Gonglue, the Communist Party of China named the newly established Second Infantry School the Gonglue Infantry School.

description.zh-cn: 中华苏维埃共和国为纪念黄公略，专门成立了以其名字命名的公略县。
description.en: To commemorate Huang Gonglue, the Chinese Soviet Republic established a county named Gonglue County after him.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军军事家

description.zh-cn: 黄公略逝世后被中共中央军委认定为“中国人民解放军军事家”。
description.en: After his death, Huang Gonglue was recognized as a "Militarist of the Chinese People's Liberation Army" by the CCP Central Military Commission.

relationships.target: 100位为新中国成立作出突出贡献的英雄模范人物

description.zh-cn: 2009年9月14日，黄公略被评为“100位为新中国成立作出突出贡献的英雄模范人物”之一。
description.en: On September 14, 2009, Huang Gonglue was selected as one of the "100 heroic and exemplary figures who made outstanding contributions to the founding of New China".
